section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.para: The gdcm2pnm command line program takes as input a DICOM file and produces a rendered bitmap file.

para.literallayout:
file-in DICOM input filename
bitmap-out Bitmap output filename

-h --help print this help text and exit
-v --version print version information and exit
-V --verbose verbose mode (warning+error).
-W --warning warning mode, print warning information
-E --error error mode, print error information
-D --debug debug mode, print debug information

section.title: Simple usage
section.para: gdcm2pnm will take as input DICOM and render it into a bitmap file using the window/level attributes value.
It is much different from the gdcmraw or gdcmimg command line tool as it will render a DICOM image. This means that the output will be rendered in 8bits ready for display.
